rows.label: bf06180100_0005
rows.name:
I can't help but feel that in all the
confusion surrounding Bahn, our concerns...

rows.label: bf06180100_0020
rows.name:
The Holy See maintains absolute control over
Blade distribution. It is quite vexing...

rows.label: bf06180100_0030
rows.name:
Awakening rates from natural
cores are very low,

rows.label: bf06180100_0040
rows.name:
which limits the pool
of compatible Drivers.

rows.label: bf06180100_0050
rows.name:
So to create large numbers of Drivers,
the cleansing Acedia provides is a necessity.

rows.label: bf06180100_0060
rows.name: That much I am willing to accept.

rows.label: bf06180100_0070
rows.name:
The real problem is the fact 
that the Holy Grail has awakened.

rows.label: bf06180100_0080
rows.name: This is no time to be squabbling over territory.

rows.label: bf06180100_0090
rows.name:
If we misread the situation even a little,
Invidia itself could be sunk to the Cloud Sea's bed.

rows.label: bf06180100_0100
rows.name: Emperor Nefer must surely be thinking the same thing...

rows.label: bf06180100_0110
rows.name:
That's why he sent his precious 
Meleph to shepherd them along.

rows.label: bf06180100_0120
rows.name: And now we find ourselves in their debt...

rows.label: bf06180100_0130
rows.name:
Who could have predicted such
an act of selflessness?

rows.label: bf06180100_0140
rows.name: Was it just the passion of youth, or was it...?

rows.label: bf06180100_0160
rows.name:
In any case, for now we should keep our troops
mobilized while we monitor the situation.

rows.label: bf06180100_0170
rows.name: I hardly expect Luxuria will comply so easily, either.
